title: Factoring 101: Turn Net 30 Invoices into Cash (LA)
desc: Factoring 101:? An introduction to Factoring (i.e. the sale of receivables). Learn how to enhance cash flow, rate customers, accounts receivable aging and pay bills using invoices. Avoid net 30 or net 60 terms and slow paying customers. Discover what bankers won?t tell you.? Seminar Topics Include: ? Factoring defined? ? Running your business without cash flow concerns? ? Advantages of factoring? ? Impact of factoring on profits? ? The costs of factoring? ? Considerations for factoring by business owners? ? Case study examples? Each completed course counts toward the 20 credits needed to receive a?free credit consultation.
